layout.title: Online Booking System

hero.title: 24/7 Online Booking For Your Thai Massage Business
hero.text: Let customers book themselves anytime from any device. Automatic reminders reduce no-shows, and you're freed from constant phone interruptions.

services.title: Fill Your Calendar, Save Time, Protect Your Income

items.title: Fill Your Calendar Automatically, Day and Night
items.text: Customers book themselves at 11pm, on Sundays, while you're treating other clients. Your calendar fills 24/7 without you lifting a finger—capturing bookings you'd otherwise miss completely.

items.title: Save Hours Every Week on Admin Work
items.text: No more phone calls to confirm appointments, send reminders, or reschedule bookings. The system handles all the tedious admin automatically—giving you hours back every week.

items.title: Stop Losing Money to No-Shows and Cancellations
items.text: Reduce no-shows by up to 80% with automatic reminders and optional deposits. Your time is protected, your income is predictable, your schedule stays full and profitable.

reviews.title: How Online Booking Transformed These Businesses

items.text: We were losing so many bookings because we couldn't answer the phone during treatments. Now we get bookings 24/7 and our no-show rate dropped from 25% to less than 5%. It's paid for itself ten times over.

features.title: Everything You Need for Professional Booking
features.text: Essential features included as standard. No upgrades needed, no surprise charges, no missing pieces—just everything your booking system needs to work perfectly.

items.title: Automated SMS & Email Reminders
items.text: Reduce no-shows by up to 80% with automatic text and email reminders sent before every appointment. Customers get timely notifications—you get reliable bookings.

items.title: Take Deposits & Online Payments
items.text: Accept payments when customers book—reducing cancellations and securing your time. Process secure credit and debit card payments online with integrated payment processing.

items.title: Syncs With Your Phone Calendar
items.text: Sync with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, and Outlook. Your appointments update automatically across all devices—never miss a booking or double-book again.

items.title: Manage Multiple Therapists
items.text: Each therapist gets their own schedule and availability settings. Customers choose their preferred therapist when booking—perfect for growing teams and multiple locations.

items.title: Customizable Booking Rules
items.text: Set minimum notice periods, maximum advance booking, buffer times, and block-out days. Complete control over when and how customers can book your time.

items.title: Customer History & Notes
items.text: Track every client's past treatments, preferences, and special requests. See appointment history instantly—deliver personalized service that keeps regulars coming back for more.

cta.title: Get Your Online Booking System
cta.text: Let's talk about your booking needs and show you exactly how the system works.
